gallery.title: Clouds blasted by supernova
gallery.caption: Small clouds have been blasted by a nearby supernova explosion.

gallery.title: Particle swarms
gallery.caption: Swarming particles streaming into metal-enriched gas clouds that recollapse 14 Myr after a SN explosion.

gallery.title: Rapid metal-enriched collapse
gallery.caption: Movie depicting SN explosion and metal-enriched recollapse.

gallery.title: A small disk galaxy
gallery.caption: A small disk galaxy formed at redshift 10.

gallery.title: Photoionizing the disk (face-on)
gallery.caption: The disk is blasted with radiation, heating and expanding gas near the center to create a ring.

gallery.title: Photoionizing the disk (edge-on)
gallery.caption: The disk is blasted with radiation, heating and expanding gas near the center to increase the scale height.

gallery.title: Zooming into the center
gallery.caption: Zooming in to get a closer look.

gallery.title: Superbubble outflow simulation
gallery.caption: Repeated supernovae blast a hole in the galactic disk, launching a superbubble outflow.
